uiDefinition.displayName: Azure Storage account name or file endpoint
uiDefinition.description: Name or file endpoint of the Azure Storage account the connector should use.
uiDefinition.tooltip: Provide the storage account name or file endopoint

uiDefinition.description: Specify a valid primary/secondary Azure Storage account access key.
uiDefinition.tooltip: Specify a valid primary/secondary Azure Storage account access key.

properties.description: Microsoft Azure Storage provides a massively scalable, durable, and highly available storage for data on the cloud, and serves as the data storage solution for modern applications. Connect to File Storage to perform various operations such as create, update, get and delete on files in your Azure Storage account.
